channel.title: Welcome! on Shirley Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on Shirley Yang

item.title: About Me
item.description: Outside of work and school, I get overly excited about STEM outreach and education, overpriced vinyl, climbing mountains 🏔, creating about a million playlists 🎧, my philosophy courses 👥, analyzing hockey stats 🏒, and organizing my letterboxd 🎞. What am I listening to right now? Glad you asked! for the one who thinks their life is a movie little AND fierce a lil' eerie
